text: Ani jevha tyancya karmanna saitana tyanna susobhita karuna dakhavita hota ani sangata hota ki manasampaiki konihi aja tumacyavara varcasvasali ho'u sakata nahi. Mi svatah tumaca samarthaka ahe, parantu jevha donhi gata jahira jhale, tevha apalya ulatapavali phirala ani mhanu lagala ki mi tara tumacyapasuna vegala ahe, vibhakta ahe. Mi te kahi pahata ahe je tumhi pahata nahi. Mi allahace bhaya balagato ani allaha motha sakta azaba denara ahe
